Dear Sirs,

It has come to our attention that your or one of your customer's servers IP

Site http://www.thebigeasyforum.com contains and distributes stolen web

this forum provides a huge list of links to a major archives of warez design

materials but now site master require to login in order to access the forum.
The exact place of infringing material distribution is
http://www.thebigeasyforum.com/ou813/index.php?showforum=18

Please use following credentials to access the forum
Login: Monday
password: 1029384756

I have provided a screenshot of the infringing thread with marks on
illegally links providing threads as an attachment to this e-mail.

We direct your attention on a fact that www.thebigeasyforum.com site
administrator set a note that nobody can register new account without
verification of the person ID. This was made so nobody will be able to find
infringing posts without uncovering the personal data through the web

This way www.thebigeasyforum.com hides from the responsibility of its piracy
actions by filtering potential forum users.
You can see on a screenshot that forum also has links to stolen templates
from another design providing companies such as Ipixie and BoxedArt.

This is not the first case regarding this infringement. 7th of November 2004
Layeredtech.com hosting company removed www.thebigeasyforum.com account
registration after having received our complaints.

Because of the obvious templatemonster products distribution, we direct your
attention to the terms of our company's License Agreement
(http://www.templatemonster.com/terms.php) which clearly prohibits
distribution of our products by any potential or current customer.

Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2003
Artvertex, Inc." The permission of www.thebigeasyforum.com information
publishing actions from your server is illegal.
Templatemonster.com website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited
in any manner or medium and is therefore making you posses illegal material.
US copyright laws protect all parts of this material. The owner of this
website has been notified of his actions, and has been told the
consequences.

Hence, we demand the immediate removal of
(http://www.thebigeasyforum.com) account from your company server and cease
the distribution of any of our products IMMEDIATELY. We have already
notified our corporate lawyers of this situation and we shall not hesitate
to exercise our legal right to pursue this matter in a court of law should
you fail to meet our demand immediately.

Templatemonster.com is committed to investigating licensing infractions not
only to protect our own interests but to protect those of the designers who
submit their designs to us as well. We are contractually obliged to protect
the intellectual property rights and livelihood of the artists whose work we
license. While we support freedom of expression, we must enforce our
licensing conditions rigorously in order to meet our responsibilities. We
feel that your cooperation regarding this matter is fully warranted, and
expect it will be promptly forthcoming.

Thank you and awaiting for your prompt answer.
